23:35:15 SQL> ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss';

Session altered.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.00
23:35:15 SQL> 23:35:15 SQL> --
23:35:15 SQL> -- merge.sql
23:35:15 SQL> --
23:35:15 SQL> 
23:35:15 SQL> -- I use this script to merge data from ibs_stage into ibs15min.
23:35:15 SQL> 
23:35:15 SQL> 
23:35:15 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_old	  (tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
23:35:15 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_dups_old(tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
23:35:15 SQL> 
23:35:15 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.24
23:35:15 SQL> RENAME ibs15min TO ibs_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.05
23:35:15 SQL> 
23:35:15 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_dups_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.31
23:35:15 SQL> RENAME ibs_dups TO ibs_dups_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.04
23:35:15 SQL> 
23:35:15 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs_dups COMPRESS AS
23:35:15   2  SELECT
23:35:15   3  tkr
23:35:15   4  ,(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')+(epochsec/24/3600))ydate
23:35:15   5  ,clse
23:35:15   6  FROM ibs_stage
23:35:15   7  UNION
23:35:15   8  SELECT tkr,ydate,clse
23:35:15   9  FROM ibs_old
23:35:15  10  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:01.44
23:35:17 SQL> 
23:35:17 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs15min COMPRESS AS
23:35:17   2  SELECT
23:35:17   3  tkr
23:35:17   4  ,ydate
23:35:17   5  ,AVG(clse)clse
23:35:17   6  FROM ibs_dups
23:35:17   7  GROUP BY tkr,ydate
23:35:17   8  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.99
23:35:18 SQL> 
23:35:18 SQL> ANALYZE TABLE ibs15min COMPUTE STATISTICS;

Table analyzed.

Elapsed: 00:00:01.55
23:35:19 SQL> 
23:35:19 SQL> -- rpt
23:35:19 SQL> 
23:35:19 SQL> SELECT
23:35:19   2  tkr
23:35:19   3  ,(sysdate - MAX(ydate))*24*60 minutes_age
23:35:19   4  ,MIN(ydate)
23:35:19   5  ,COUNT(ydate)
23:35:19   6  ,MAX(ydate)FROM
23:35:19   7  ibs15min
23:35:19   8  GROUP BY tkr
23:35:19   9  /
